cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology on June 15, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2225, National Science Foundation for the Future Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 57 (Friday, March 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JOHNSON of Texas:
H.R. 2225.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States.
[Page H1693]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

title: National Science Foundation for the Future Act
